title: ASMR Beauty Homeless
description: ASMR Beauty Homeless is a beauty dress-up game in which you take on the role of a compassionate doctor helping your homeless friend Anna regain her dignity. Begin by providing her with essential hygiene careâ€”clean her body, brush her teeth, and carefully treat the area around her piercing to restore her health and comfort. Once she's all freshened up, show off your fashion expertise by choosing the perfect outfit that transforms her appearance and lifts her spirits.
